Info

Defines class JsonBase with attribute(s) and method(s). Loads the ATS configuration for the ATS.

class ats_utilities.config_io.json.JsonBase(info_file: str | None, verbose: bool = False)[source]¶

Bases: ATSChecker

Defines class JsonBase with attribute(s) and method(s). Loads the ATS configuration for the ATS. Configuration base JSON API support.

It defines:

attributes:
_verbose - Enable/Disable verbose option.
tool_operational - Control ATS operational functionality.
json2obj - In API for information.
obj2json - Out API for information.
option_parser - Option parser for ATS.
methods:
__init__ - Initials JsonBase constructor.
is_tool_ok - Checks is tool operational.
is_tool_ok() → bool[source]¶

Checks is tool operational.

Returns:

True (tool is operational) | False

Return type:

<bool>

Exceptions:

None
